Pre-Game Insights: Australia will enter this game after beating Sri Lanka and registering their first win.
Pakistan lost to India in Ahmedabad.
The Australian team suffered two tough defeats in their first three games but finally registered their first win against Sri Lanka.
The Australian bowling has looked great with both fast bowlers and spinners being among the wickets.
Pakistan have had many holes in their team with poor performers across the line-up.
The top-order batters have failed to score a lot of runs, especially with Babar Azam not finding form.
Their spin bowling has been a big letdown with Shadab Khan and Muhammad Rizwan failing to pick regular wickets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The M. Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru has produced great batting tracks with an average score of 266.
Here, the batters generally dominate with the stadium's small boundaries.
But bowlers can come as the pitch allows fast bowlers to get some swing with the new ball.
Similarly, the spinners could get some turn as the pitch settles down.
